goals.active: Help the Vigil investigate the undead raids on Snowdrift Haven.
goals.complete: I went with Gahn Towerbreaker and the Vigil to investigate the disappearance of my fallen comrade's body. We travelled to Snowdrift Haven and fought off an undead raiding party. We also recovered an amulet much like the one Howl used to wear. The amulets are connected to the necromancer Rissa, so we decided to check in with the other orders before we proceed.

goals.active: Travel to the Black Citadel to debrief with the representatives of the orders of Tyria.
goals.complete: With help from the Vigil, I proved that amulets much like the one owned by Howl the Brazen are definitely involved in a sharp increase in undead activity all across the region. We decided that more information was required, so I agreed continue to work with all three orders orders to dig deeper into this mystery.
